# WKMediaCaptureType.cameraAndMicrophone

**Case**

A media device or devices that can capture audio and video.

## Declaration

```swift
case cameraAndMicrophone
```

## Constants

- **WKMediaCaptureType.camera**: A media device that can capture video.
- **WKMediaCaptureType.microphone**: A media device that can capture audio.

items.description: A media device that can capture video.
items.name: WKMediaCaptureType.camera

items.description: A media device that can capture audio.
items.name: WKMediaCaptureType.microphone
